title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not give it focus.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
